titles.title: A bill to prohibit the departments and agencies of the Federal Government from requiring that any State, or political subdivision thereof, utilize a metric system of measurement.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5256-5257)

bill.summary: 5/4/1994--Introduced. Prohibits any entity of the Federal Government from requiring any State or local government to use a metric measurement system.
